text: <a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-1/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Furthermore then we beseech you, brethren, and exhort *you* by the Lord Jesus, that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, *so* ye would abound more and more.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-2/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-3/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 For this is the will of God, *even* your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-4/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-5/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God:

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-6/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 That no *man* go beyond and defraud his brother in *any* matter: because that the Lord *is* the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-7/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-8/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-9/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-10/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia: but we beseech you, brethren, that ye increase more and more;

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-11/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-12/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and *that* ye may have lack of nothing.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-13/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-14/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-15/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive *and* remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-16/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-17/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Then we which are alive *and* remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-4-18/" title="1 Thessalonians 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
